description: Enterprise techniques used by PLAINTEE, ATT&CK software S0254 v1.1
name: PLAINTEE (S0254)

techniques.comment: An older variant of PLAINTEE performs UAC bypass.[1]
PLAINTEE gains persistence by adding the Registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce.[1]
PLAINTEE uses cmd.exe to execute commands on the victim’s machine.[1]
PLAINTEE encodes C2 beacons using XOR.[1]
PLAINTEE has downloaded and executed additional plugins.[1]
PLAINTEE uses reg add to add a Registry Run key for persistence.[1]
PLAINTEE performs the tasklist command to list running processes.[1]
PLAINTEE collects general system enumeration data about the infected machine and checks the OS version.[1]
PLAINTEE uses the ipconfig /all command to gather the victim’s IP address.[1]
